artist: Mandan; White Bear Woman; Red White Buffalo
creditline: Lent by American Museum of Natural History
description: plain muslin dress, short sleeves with dark floral bands at cuffs and through shoulder; body of dress adorned with three horse and riders moving toward the left; two men shooting rifles at left toward right; other figures stand before horses; five representative gun shot wounds in a row with dripping blod just below neck line
title: Dress
